description: Removes an association between a notification rule and an Chatbot topic so that subscribers to that topic stop receiving notifications when the events described in the rule are triggered.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notification rule.

parameters.name: TargetAddress
parameters.description: The ARN of the Chatbot topic to unsubscribe from the notification rule.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the the notification rule from which you have removed a subscription.
